com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.tileprovider

Class MapTileLayerBasic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.tileprovider.MapTileLayerBase
      • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.tileprovider.MapTileLayerArray
        • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.tileprovider.MapTileLayerBasic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TileLayerConstants, IMapTileProviderCallback

    public class MapTileLayerBasic
extends MapTileLayerArray
implements IMapTileProviderCallback
    A base class for tile layers to built, this is a simple collection of tile sources.
